Review_Title: Writing this review after 11 days of usage
Review_Text: The mobile is very good for the price. It has really good performance. I play a lot of COD Battle Royale in it, doesn't lag much. I used to use a Redmi Note 7 Pro (6GB/128GB). Now after I upgraded to the Realme, I feel its a worthy upgrade! The only issue I faced is the Ghost Touch thing (Everyone may not face the same)... But if the same thing happens with you, then just lock your screen and again open it.Suggestion: If you can then go for the 8GB RAM variant, I went for the same.
